ThingDef.label: Huntsman's totem (Endurance)
ThingDef.description: A totem of the hunt, a skull seemingly made entirely out of crystal. Totems such as are nothing more than peculiar collectibles. Their true value can only be uncovered by those blessed with The Huntsman's blood.\n\nA lycanthrope can use this totem to gain a bonus to the rate wounds heal while in beast form. A single lycanthrope can use multiple totems of the same type.
